Global.comment: 定义了全局公用资源,包含了字体、class、文字颜色。定义Global标签的xml文件需要放到资源目录的根位置,目前命名为硬编码“global.xml”,详见GlobalManager::Startup函数代码

Attribute.name: disabledfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的disabled字体颜色,如(0xFFA7A6AA)

Attribute.name: defaultfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的字体颜色,如(0xFF000000)

Attribute.name: linkfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的link字体颜色,如(0xFF0000FF)

Attribute.name: linkhoverfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的linkhoverfont字体颜色,如(0xFFD3215F)

Attribute.name: selectedcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的selected字体颜色,如(0xFFBAE4FF)

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 字体名字,如果指定为system,则使用系统默认字体(在xp上为新宋体,高版本系统上为微软雅黑)

Attribute.name: size
Attribute.comment: 字体大小,如(13)

Attribute.name: bold
Attribute.comment: 字体是否加粗,如(true)

Attribute.name: underline
Attribute.comment: 字体是否加下划线,如(true)

Attribute.name: italic
Attribute.comment: 字体是否为斜体,如(true)

Class.comment: 需要在Global标签或者Window标签内定义

Attribute.name: Class
Attribute.comment: 自定义的控件样式的名字,在需要使用样式的地方直接指定这个名字,如(btn_default)

Attribute.name: Value
Attribute.comment: 内置的控件属性,如(text="测试" height="12")

TextColor.comment: 用字符串常量代替数值来定义颜色,需要在Global标签内定义

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 颜色的名字,如(white)

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 常量对应的颜色,如(0xFFFFFFFF)

Language.comment: 实际并不存在此标签,这里说明多语言的用法。语言文件文件需要放到“lang\zh_CN\gdstrings.ini”(相对可执行程序,并不是相对资源目录),详见GlobalManager::Startup函数代码。语言定义的例子：“STRING_OK = 确 定”,其中STRING_OK是文本ID,确定是此ID代表的实际文本,需要设置多语言文本的地方直接指定文本ID即可,每行定义一个ID

Include.comment: 用于xml文件的复用和较大xml文件的分割,指定此标签的地方会在对应位置自动展开指定的xml文件,需要包含在根标签内部,不能独立于根标签使用

Attribute.name: source
Attribute.comment: 要插入的xml文件的路径,如(list_item.xml)

Attribute.name: count
Attribute.comment: 重复插入的数量

Event.comment: 此需要包含在某个控件标签内使用。当包含Event标签的控件触发接收的消息时会动态设置接受者控件的属性,设置为applyattribute代表的值

Attribute.name: type
Attribute.comment: 接收的消息类型,用空格分隔多个消息,如(killfocus,完整的消息类型见duilib库Define.h文件)

Attribute.name: receiver
Attribute.comment: 接受者控件的名字,用空格分隔多个名字,如(btn_test).如果名字以“./”或者“.\开头”,则代表接受者控件是包含Event标签的控件的子控件,否则代表整个窗体内的某个控件

Attribute.name: applyattribute
Attribute.comment: 动态设置的属性值,可以设置多个属性

BubbledEvent.comment: 此需要包含在某个控件标签内使用。当包含BubbledEvent标签的控件或者其子控件触发接收的消息时会动态设置接受者控件的属性,设置为applyattribute代表的值,此标签只能用于容器控件

Attribute.name: type
Attribute.comment: 接收的消息类型,用空格分隔多个消息,如(killfocus,完整的消息类型见duilib库Define.h文件)

Attribute.name: receiver
Attribute.comment: 接受者控件的名字,用空格分隔多个名字,如(btn_test).如果名字以“./”或者“.\开头”,则代表接受者控件是包含Event标签的控件的子控件,否则代表整个窗体内的某个控件

Attribute.name: applyattribute
Attribute.comment: 动态设置的属性值,可以设置多个属性

Attribute.name: size
Attribute.comment: 窗口的初始化大小,如(800,600)

Attribute.name: mininfo
Attribute.comment: 窗口最小大小,如(320,240)

Attribute.name: heightpercent
Attribute.comment: 窗口的初始高度占屏幕高度的百分比,应该写在size、mininfo、maxinfo属性后面

Attribute.name: sizebox
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动改变窗口大小的边距,如(4,4,6,6)

Attribute.name: caption
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动的标题栏大小的边距,最后一个参数是指离上边框的距离,如(0,0,0,28)

Attribute.name: textid
Attribute.comment: 窗体标题字符串的ID,ID在多语言文件中指定,如(STRID_MIANWINDOW_TITLE)

Attribute.name: roundcorner
Attribute.comment: 窗口圆角大小,如(4,4)

Attribute.name: shadowattached
Attribute.comment: 窗口是否附加阴影效果,如(true)

Attribute.name: shadowimage
Attribute.comment: 使用自定义的阴影素材去代替默认的阴影效果，设置的路径要注意相对路径以及九宫格属性，如(file='../public/bk/bk_shadow.png' corner='30,30,30,30')

Attribute.name: shadowcorner
Attribute.comment: 设置了shadowimage属性后，设置此属性来指定阴影素材的九宫格描述，这个属性一定要写在size属性前面

Attribute.name: alphafixcorner
Attribute.comment: 透明通道修补范围的的九宫格描述

Attribute.name: custom_shadow
Attribute.comment: 与alphafixcorner完全一样，为了兼容老版本xml所以没有去掉这个属性

Attribute.name: class
Attribute.comment: 控件样式,用样式里面的属性值来设置本控件的属性,如(btn_default),可以同时指定多个样式,各个样式之间用空格分隔,需要写在第一个属性位置,

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 控件名字,同一窗口内必须唯一,如(testbtn)

Attribute.name: halign
Attribute.comment: 控件的横向位置,如(center),支持left、center、right三种位置

Attribute.name: valign
Attribute.comment: 控件的纵向位置,如(center),支持top、center、bottom三种位置

Attribute.name: bkcolor
Attribute.comment: 背景颜色字符串常量,如(white)

Attribute.name: bkcolor1
Attribute.comment: 背景渐变色1,和bkcolor配合使用,如(blue)

Attribute.name: normalcolor
Attribute.comment: 普通状态颜色,如(white)

Attribute.name: hotcolor
Attribute.comment: 悬浮状态颜色,如(white)

Attribute.name: pushedcolor
Attribute.comment: 按下状态颜色,如(white)

Attribute.name: disabledcolor
Attribute.comment: 禁用状态颜色,如(white)

Attribute.name: bordercolor
Attribute.comment: 边框颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: bordersize
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或RECT类型的值。当值为ING时则左、上、右、下都用该值作为宽。值为RECT类型时则分别设置左、上、右、下的边框

Attribute.name: leftbordersize
Attribute.comment: 左边边框大小,如(1),设置该值大于0,则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: topbordersize
Attribute.comment: 顶部边框大小,如(1),设置该值大于0,则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: rightbordersize
Attribute.comment: 右边边框大小,如(1),设置该值大于0,则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: bottombordersize
Attribute.comment: 底部边框大小,如(1),设置该值大于0,则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: borderround
Attribute.comment: 边框圆角半径,如(2,2)

Attribute.name: width
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或STRING类型的值.当值为INT是则设置控件的最小宽度,如(100);当值为STRING时,stretch代表由父容器计算控件宽度,auto代表根据内容情况自动计算宽度

Attribute.name: height
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或STRING类型的值.当值为INT是则设置控件的最小高度,如(100);当值为STRING时,stretch代表由父容器计算控件高度,auto代表根据内容情况自动计算高度

Attribute.name: minwidth
Attribute.comment: 控件的最小宽度,如(30)

Attribute.name: minheight
Attribute.comment: 控件的最小高度,如(30)

Attribute.name: maxwidth
Attribute.comment: 控件的最大宽度,描述同width

Attribute.name: maxheight
Attribute.comment: 控件的最大高度,描述同height

Attribute.name: bkimage
Attribute.comment: 背景图片,如(bk.bmp或file='aaa.jpg' res='' dest='0,0,0,0' source='0,0,0,0' corner='0,0,0,0' fade='255' xtiled='false' ytiled='false')

Attribute.name: tooltiptext
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮提示,如(请在这里输入你的密码)

Attribute.name: tooltiptextid
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮提示,指定多语言模块的ID,当tooltiptext为空时则显示此属性,如(TOOL_TIP_ID)

Attribute.name: dataid
Attribute.comment: 自定义字符串数据,辅助函数，供用户使用

Attribute.name: enabled
Attribute.comment: 是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: mouse
Attribute.comment: 本控件是否可以响应鼠标操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: keyboard
Attribute.comment: 非CButtonUI类忽略该值,为false时不支持TAB_STOP,且该对象不处理键盘信息

Attribute.name: visible
Attribute.comment: 是否可见,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadevisible
Attribute.comment: 是否可见,如(true),此属性会触发控件动画效果

Attribute.name: float
Attribute.comment: 是否使用绝对定位,如(true)

Attribute.name: menu
Attribute.comment: 是否需要右键菜单,如(true)

Attribute.name: nofocus
Attribute.comment: 是否可以获取焦点,如(true)

Attribute.name: alpha
Attribute.comment: 控件的整体透明度,如(128)

Attribute.name: state
Attribute.comment: 控件的当前状态,支持normal、hot、pushed、disabled状态

Attribute.name: cursortype
Attribute.comment: 鼠标移动到控件上时的鼠标光标,arrow、hand、ibeam

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下的状态图片

Attribute.name: disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用的状态图片

Attribute.name: forenormalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态前景图片

Attribute.name: forehotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态前景图片

Attribute.name: forepushedimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下的状态前景图片

Attribute.name: foredisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用的状态前景图片

Attribute.name: renderoffset
Attribute.comment: 控件绘制时的偏移量,如(10,10),一般用于绘制动画

Attribute.name: fadealpha
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件透明渐变动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadehot
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件悬浮状态下 的透明渐变动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadewidth
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件宽度渐变动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadeheight
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件高度渐变动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadeinoutxfromleft
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件从左到右的动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadeinoutxfromright
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件从右到左的动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadeinoutyfromtop
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件从上到下的动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: fadeinoutyfrombottom
Attribute.comment: 是否启用控件从下到上的动画,如(true)

Attribute.name: width
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或STRING类型的值.当值为INT是则设置控件的最小宽度,如(100);当值为STRING时,stretch代表由父容器计算控件宽度,auto代表根据内容情况自动计算宽度

Attribute.name: height
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或STRING类型的值.当值为INT是则设置控件的最小高度,如(100);当值为STRING时,stretch代表由父容器计算控件高度,auto代表根据内容情况自动计算高度

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 显示文本,如(测试文本)

Attribute.name: textid
Attribute.comment: 多语言功能的ID,如(TEXT_OUT)

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 文本的输出位置,如(center),支持left、center、right、top、vcenter、bottom

Attribute.name: font
Attribute.comment: 字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: endellipsis
Attribute.comment: 句末显示不完是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: textpadding
Attribute.comment: 文字显示的边距,如(2,2,2,2)

Attribute.name: normaltextcolor
Attribute.comment: 普通字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: hottextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: pushedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: disabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: disabled字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: linelimit
Attribute.comment: 是否限制正行输出,如(true)

Attribute.name: singleline
Attribute.comment: 是否单行输出文字,如(true)

Attribute.name: selected
Attribute.comment: 是否选中

Attribute.name: selectednormalimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的普通状态图片

Attribute.name: selectedhotimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: selectedpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标按下的状态图片

Attribute.name: selecteddisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的禁用的状态图片

Attribute.name: selectedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中状态字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: selectednormalcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中的普通状态字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: selectedhotcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标悬浮状态字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: selectedpushedcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标按下状态字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: selecteddisabledcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中的禁用状态字体颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: selectedforenormalimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的前景图片

Attribute.name: selectedforehotimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标悬浮状态的图片

Attribute.name: selectedforepushedimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的鼠标按下状态的前景图片

Attribute.name: selectedforedisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的禁用状态的前景图片

Attribute.name: group
Attribute.comment: 所属组的名称

Attribute.name: hor
Attribute.comment: 水平或垂直,如(true)

Attribute.name: min
Attribute.comment: 进度最小值,如(0)

Attribute.name: max
Attribute.comment: 进度最大值,如(100)

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 进度值,如(50)

Attribute.name: isstretchfore
Attribute.comment: 指定进度条前景图片是否缩放显示

Attribute.name: progresscolor
Attribute.comment: 进度条前景颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: progressimage
Attribute.comment: 进度条前景图片

Attribute.name: thumbnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbsize
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块大小,如(10,10)

Attribute.name: step
Attribute.comment: 进度步长,如(1)

Attribute.name: progressbarpadding
Attribute.comment: 滑动条绘制时缩小的内边距

Attribute.name: button1normalimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button1hotimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button1pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button1disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: button2normalimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button2hotimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button2pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button2disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: railnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识普通状态图片

Attribute.name: railhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: railpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: raildisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: bknormalimage
Attribute.comment: 背景普通状态图片

Attribute.name: bkhotimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: bkpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: bkdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 背景禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: hor
Attribute.comment: 水平或垂直,如(true)

Attribute.name: linesize
Attribute.comment: 滚动一行的大小,如(8)

Attribute.name: thumbminlength
Attribute.comment: 滑块的最小长度

Attribute.name: range
Attribute.comment: 滚动范围,如(100)

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 滚动位置,如(0)

Attribute.name: showbutton1
Attribute.comment: 是否显示左或上按钮,如(true)

Attribute.name: showbutton2
Attribute.comment: 是否显示右或下按钮,如(true)

Attribute.name: autohidescroll
Attribute.comment: 是否自动隐藏滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: childmargin
Attribute.comment: 子控件之间的额外距离,如(4)

Attribute.name: mousechild
Attribute.comment: 本控件的子控件是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: xmlfile
Attribute.comment: 要嵌入的xml文件的地址,如(childxml.xml)

Attribute.name: fadeswitch
Attribute.comment: 当切换页面时是否使用动画效果,如(false)

Attribute.name: selectedid
Attribute.comment: 默认选中的页面id,如(0)

Attribute.name: columns
Attribute.comment: 列数,如(4)

Attribute.name: itemsize
Attribute.comment: 子项固定大小,如(128,128)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: vscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 设置本容器的纵向滚动条的样式

Attribute.name: hscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 设置本容器的横向滚动条的样式

Attribute.name: scrollbarpadding
Attribute.comment: 滚动条的外边距,可以让滚动条不占满容器,如(2,2,2,2)

Attribute.name: vscrollunit
Attribute.comment: 容器的纵向滚动条滚动步长,0代表使用默认步长

Attribute.name: scrollbarfloat
Attribute.comment: 容器的滚动条是否悬浮在子控件上面,如(true)

Attribute.name: defaultdisplayscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 暂时无用,未开发

Attribute.name: holdend
Attribute.comment: 是否一直保持显示末尾位置,如(true)

Attribute.name: dropbox
Attribute.comment: 设置弹出框的样式,如(padding="1,1,1,1")

Attribute.name: dropboxsize
Attribute.comment: 弹出框大小设置

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: scrollselect
Attribute.comment: 是否随滚动改变选中项,如(false)

Attribute.name: indent
Attribute.comment: 子控件的缩进,如(3)

RichEdit.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu return windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autovscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入竖向滚动,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autohscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入横向滚动,如(true)

Attribute.name: wanttab
Attribute.comment: 是否接受tab按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: wantreturnmsg
Attribute.comment: 是否接受return按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: returnmsgwantctrl
Attribute.comment: 是否接受ctrl+return按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: rich
Attribute.comment: 是否使用富格式,如(true)

Attribute.name: multiline
Attribute.comment: 是否使用多行,如(true)

Attribute.name: readonly
Attribute.comment: 是否只读,如(false)

Attribute.name: password
Attribute.comment: 是否显示密码符,如(true)

Attribute.name: number
Attribute.comment: 是否只允许输入数字,如(false)

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 文字对齐方式,取值left、right、hcenter、top、vcenter、bottom,如(right)

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 显示文本,如(测试文本)

Attribute.name: font
Attribute.comment: 字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: normaltextcolor
Attribute.comment: 普通状态文字颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: disabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 禁用状态文字颜色,不指定则使用默认颜色,如(blue)

Attribute.name: promptmode
Attribute.comment: 是否显示提示文字,如(true)

Attribute.name: prompttext
Attribute.comment: 文本框内提示文字,当文本框text为空时显示

Attribute.name: prompttextid
Attribute.comment: 多语言功能的ID,如(TEXT_OUT)

Attribute.name: promptcolor
Attribute.comment: 文本框内提示文字的颜色
